item.title: I Cracked Open A Mystery Object By The Thames
item.description: A mudlarking adventure along the Thames uncovers a mysterious object, revealing its features, possible origins, and the excitement of uncovering hidden history.

item.title: London Mudlarking - The Saddest Thames Find
item.description: A thoughtful mudlarking find along the River Thames reveals a somber piece of history, focusing on its context, meaning, and why it stands out among riverside discoveries.

item.title: So I Found A Diamond Ring By The Thames
item.description: A surprising riverside discovery along the Thames uncovers a lost diamond ring, highlighting the find, its condition, and the excitement of unexpected treasures. A mudlarking permit from the Port of London Authority is required in order to mudlark on the River Thames

item.title: I Didn’t Expect to Find THIS While Mudlarking!
item.description: A mudlarking adventure uncovers surprising items along the shoreline, highlighting unique discoveries, historical artifacts, and the thrill of exploring the tide line. A mudlarking permit from the Port of London Authority is required in order to mudlark on the River Thames

item.title: This Time It Was All About Tiny Artefacts!
item.description: This video highlights a collection of small but fascinating artifacts, exploring their history, significance, and the excitement of discovering and examining these miniature treasures.

item.title: Exploring Ancient Thames Pier: Here's What I Found
item.description: Join a journey along an old Thames pier, uncovering artifacts, historical insights, and discoveries that reveal life and activity along the river centuries ago.

item.title: Pudding Lane token takes us back to the Great Fire of London.
item.description: This video explores a token found on Pudding Lane and its connection to the Great Fire of London, offering historical context and insight into daily life during the 17th century. A mudlarking permit from the Port of London Authority is required in order to mudlark on the River Thames

item.title: Finding A Rolex Watch - Is It Real Or Not?
item.description: This video follows the discovery of a Rolex watch and examines the details used to determine whether it’s authentic or not, focusing on craftsmanship, markings, and expert checks.

item.title: Closing 2025 on the Thames As the Last Treasures Emerged
item.description: A reflective look at the final discoveries of 2025 along the Thames, highlighting notable finds, historical context, and what they reveal as the year comes to a close. A mudlarking permit from the Port of London Authority is required in order to mudlark on the River Thames

item.description: Exploring an 1881 coin and the notable Americans who might have once owned it, highlighting its history, rarity, and collectible significance. A mudlarking permit from the Port of London Authority is required in order to mudlark on the River Thames

item.title: Finding Ship Remains Along The Foreshore
item.description: Exploring historical shipwreck remains uncovered along the foreshore, examining their history, significance, and what they reveal about maritime life.

item.title: The owner of this padlock lost his youngest son in World War One
item.description: The story behind a padlock whose owner lost his youngest son in World War One, exploring its historical significance and the personal memory it represents.

item.description: A fascinating adventure inspired by a 2,000-year-old artifact, exploring its history, significance, and the surprising journey it led to.

item.title: A Huge Find Right Before I Left
item.description: A surprising and exciting find uncovered just before leaving, highlighting its history, significance, and why it made the final moments so memorable.
